definition: Shancheng district of Hebi city 鶴壁市|鹤壁市[He4 bi4 shi4], Henan
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]
Shancheng district of Hebi city 鶴壁市|鹤壁市[He4 bi4 shi4], Henan

sentences.english: Shancheng gold ore deposit is a fault controlled quartz-vein type gold ore deposit in Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 山城金矿为石英脉型金矿，受断裂构造控制。

sentences.english: We drank cheap Shancheng Beer, we joked around, we took turns singing songs.
sentences.chinese: 我们喝了廉价的山城啤酒，我们开玩笑，轮流唱歌。

sentences.english: The town is in the mountains, named "mountain town".
sentences.chinese: 该城镇修建在群山之中，故取名“山城”。

sentences.english: I grew up in a tiny Baltimore row house in a faraway mountain area.
sentences.chinese: 我在遥远的山城巴尔的摩市的一栋小排房里长大。

sentences.english: It is always raining, or about to rain, in the mountainous city;
sentences.chinese: 这座山城时常下雨，要么就是雨雾蒙蒙。

sentences.english: The site is an hour drive up north near the city of Ilsan.
sentences.chinese: 场地距离一山城北部一小时车程。

sentences.english: We are going on a guided tour around the mountain city.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算在这山城作一次配导游的旅行。

sentences.english: Chongqing is a large and flourishing mountain city of 6,470,000 inhabitants.
sentences.chinese: 重庆是一个拥有647万人口的繁华大型山城。

sentences.english: Disused tea factory standing sentinel over tea garden hillside, Hill Country.
sentences.chinese: 山城，茶园丘陵上一个已经被废弃了的茶厂岗哨。

sentences.english: This town is built among the mountains, so its name is called "Mountain town".
sentences.chinese: 该城镇修建在群山之中，故取名“山城”。

sentences.english: DEEP in the heart of China, the hilly riverside city of Chongqing is burning with ambition and wreathed in a shroud of smog.
sentences.chinese: 在中国深处，山城重庆雄心勃发，烟雾缭绕。

sentences.english: She wanted to rescue her brothers, but she had no key to the glass mountain.
sentences.chinese: 她要救哥哥，可又没有了玻璃山城堡的钥匙。
